diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,27 @@
+#include "tensorflow/core/framework/register_types.h"
+#include "tensorflow/contrib/periodic_intersperse/core/kernels/periodic_intersperse_op.h"
+
+namespace tensorflow {
+
+REGISTER_KERNEL_BUILDER(Name("PeriodicIntersperse")
+                            .HostMemory("desired_shape")
+                            .Device(DEVICE_CPU),
+                        PeriodicIntersperseOp);
+
+#define REGISTER_GPU_KERNEL(type)                               \
+  REGISTER_KERNEL_BUILDER(Name("PeriodicIntersperse")           \
+                              .Device(DEVICE_GPU)               \
+                              .HostMemory("desired_shape")      \
+                              .TypeConstraint<type>("T"),       \
+                          PeriodicIntersperseOp);
+TF_CALL_GPU_NUMBER_TYPES(REGISTER_GPU_KERNEL);
+#undef REGISTER_GPU_KERNEL
+
+#ifdef TENSORFLOW_USE_SYCL
+REGISTER_KERNEL_BUILDER(Name("PeriodicIntersperse")
+                            .Device(DEVICE_SYCL)
+                            .HostMemory("output"),
+                        PeriodicIntersperseOp);
+#endif  // TENSORFLOW_USE_SYCL
+
+}
body: Please add `}  // namespace tensorflow` to the closing of this namespace.
body_html: Please add } // namespace tensorflow to the closing of this namespace.
body_text: Please add }  // namespace tensorflow to the closing of this namespace.
